name: BEAN BAG SENSATIONS
description:
NEW BEAN BAG SENSATIONS !!

Sets of 5 bean bags specifically designed to give extra sensory stimulation as well as the classic games!  These are a fantastic way to stimulate the little people in your life!

Each bean bag has a different sensory experience - from soft to rough to furry to smooth to buttons to ribbons etc - the list is endless...some bags even have windows with items inside!!

Bags are filled with non-toxic poly pellets and in some cases poly pellets and an organic fiber fill to give a different sensory feel.

Bags are between 10 -12cm square in size and each set is made up of bags within this size range: again different sizes for different sensations.

Each set is made up at time of ordering and we will randomly put together a full sensory experience for you, so please allow 5-7 days from purchase date for postage.

{Due to the large range of embellishments,designs, styles etc we do not offer a specific customisation/fabric choice - we will however gladly colour match male/female (e.g. less pink for boys etc)  }

We 100% guarantee that no two bags will be the same!!

We also include 8 suggestion games to play - though we're sure you'll think of hundreds more!


N.B. due to embellishments we recommend sets for 36 months and above - however parents should use personal discretion for younger children.
AllyBeeDesigns has a working history in behavouralism and has used these Bean Bags as well as our classic range for many years with children of all ages and intellectual capabilities (they are great for children with Autism due to sensory stimulation too).

(c) 2011 AllyBeeDesigns
For any further information please email us at awpyoung@hotmail.com or check out our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/AllyBeeDesigns

name: Mini Cutesie Doll  3"
description:
Mini-Cutesie Doll

 

Measures 3"Tall from head to toe

 

Made from 100% wool felt and hand-sewn

 

Custom made to order (just let me know what you'd like!)  Let your imagination go wild:

Knight
Fairy
Princess
Goth Fairy
Vampire
Alien
.......

 

Every care is taken while sewing these little dolls however we recommend that they are not used in rough play due to their handsewn nature.

 

They are also NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN UNDER 36 MONTHS DUE TO SMALL PARTS

 

Like what you see...please check out our range in store or at our other sites:

www.allybeedesigns.com

www.facebook.com/AllyBeeDesigns - Pictures available of previous made dolls


WE ALSO PRODUCE ITTY BITTY BOOS - at 3" in a range of characters
 

Cheers xx

name: Complete Starter Set - Mama Moon Pads
description:
Complete Set of 18 Eco Friendly Reusable Cloth Menstrual Pads & Panty Liners


With this  Set, you will receive, six overnight cloth pads, six regular cloth pads and six cloth panty liners.

You will get a random set or you can contact me to discuss a custom set - I have a large range of farbics x



Please be advised that my fabric stock changes daily with the volume of orders I fill. I will always try to get you the fabrics you prefer thoughx 


The details:

The Overnight Pads

Measure approx 35cm in length and 20cm in width (6cm when snapped shut) - they are flared at both ends to help avoid any leaks

 Materials: Made of an outer layer of comfortable flannel with a layer of 100% organic cotton batting, waterproof PUL  and a layer of absorbant terry.

 

Great for overnight



The Regular Pads
Measures: Approximately 25cm in length and 18cm in width (6cm when snapped shut)
Materials: Made of an outer layer of comfortable flannel with a layer of waterproof fabric (PUL) and100% cotton batting sewn in between.

Flow Meter: My pads usually contain a medium - heavy flow - great for mon cup backup

 The Panty Liners
Measures: Approximately 20cm length and 15cm width (6cm when snapped shut)

 Materials: Made of an 4 layers of comfortable flannel

Flow Meter: Panty liners are best for light days (like the end of your period) since they do not contain a waterproof lining.

Care: Simply store used pads/liners in cold water (to help prevent staining) and then toss them in the wash before drying out. Pads/liners are machine washable and dryer safe. If cared for properly, they can last for years.

 

We make a range of other sizes - Post-Partum, petite, long, extra-long - if you'd like a custom set made up please contact me at awpyoung@hotmail.com

 

Also check out our full range i at www.allybeedesigns.com & facebook or www.allybeedesigns.com

 

Cheers

name: Car Track/Holder - FREE PERSONALISATION
description:
Folding Car Track- Holder and Playmat - EXTRA LARGE

 

**new track fabric!!**



As my boy grows...so does his need for a larger play space for him and his friends.

So I made the Large car playmat/folding track with storage for 5-6 cars/trucks/trains etc (various sizes).  

I then slip the whole thing in my handbag for easy storage/access where ever we are.

~~~~~



This Play mat measures approx 60cm x 70cm and is made from 100% new cotton materials.

 

Each mat comes with an easy storage pocket and snap closure and is triple stitched to give extra strength.

Blankets are completely machine washable and can be ironed on a warm setting.

 

Upon purchasing please let me know your childs name for personalisation.

 

Please email me if you'd like something different.

 

Please view our FACEBOOK PAGE for a full range of products: 
http://www.facebook.com/AllyBeeDesigns

** We have two other sized mats avaliable in store x

name: Bean Bag Sets (6 bags)
description:
Bean Bags come in a standard set of 6.

 

Bean Bags make great classic toys for children as they encourage hand/eye coordination skills, colour regcognition, counting skills...oh yes and they are heaps of fun!

 

Each set is randomly filled with bags of bright colours and patterns to give extra sensory input for little ones.

With each set we also send eight games for you to play xx


Every bag is 100% cotton, fully lined and filled with poly pellets.

You can wash these bags on the gentle cycle if they get dirty - don't tumble dry though!

 

Please let us know at checkout if you would like a male/female themed set and we'll try to help you out (i.e. less pink for boys, less blue for girls) - if not we'll send a random mix of bright colours.

N.B. We've tried to make our sets bright and colourful and as non-gender specific as possible xx


We're happy to make you a custom set/s of particular colours/ fabrics (upon avaliablity)- if you're interested please contact me via email me at awpyoung@hotmail.com.

The colours shown in the set are a guide only - most of our sets will match the colours shown however occassionaly we're snowed under with orders and the colour combinations may change - there will always be 6 different bright colours though..matching as closley as possible to what's shown :-)

 

Customer Feedback:

 "Thanks for the wonderful beanie bags. I've come back again and again as they're such fantastic presents! In a world with plenty of fancy flashy options, these have been a real hit and I would highly recommend. Am sure I'll be back for more!" A.G.
